When you meet a lvl 30+ adventurer whose name

<%sM_race>'s <%sM_sex>...<bw_break>

165707.『<%sM_race>』の『<%sM_sex>』で\nなまえに 小さい『<%sM:
When you meet a lvl 30 or higher adventurer
with <%sM_race>'s <%sM_sex> that contains the
small letters <%sM_odai1> in the name...<bw_break>

165709.『<%sM_race>』の『<%sM_sex>』で\nなまえに 小さい『<%sM:
When you meet an adventurer of Lv30 or higher whose name contains the small letters "<%sM_odai1>" and "<%sM_odai2>" in
"<%sM_race>". ...

165711.『<%sM_race>』の『<%sM_sex>』で\nなまえに 小さい『<%sM:
When you meet a Lv3 0 or higher adventurer who has a <%sM_race> with a <%sM_sex> that contains two small letters in its name:
<%sM_odai1> and <%sM_odai2>. Adventurers with lvl 3.0 or higher...

165712.どうやら今なら 対象となる冒険者を\n変えることもできるようだ……。\n対象とな:
Apparently, you can change the target
adventurer now... Would you like to change
the target adventurer?<yesno 2><close>

165713.ふしぎな小箱に\n光り輝く文字が 浮かび上がった。\n<bw_break>:
A mysterious little box with glowing letters
on it...<bw_break>

165714.ふしぎな小箱に\n光り輝く文字が 浮かび上がった。\n<bw_break>:
A mysterious little box with glowing letters
on it...<bw_break>

165715.ふしぎな小箱は 何も反応しなかった。\n<br>\nもう一度 ふしぎな小箱を 使:
The curious little box is not responding. It
will be <%nL_DAY> before you can use the
curious little box again...<end>

165716.ふしぎな小箱が 示した冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがいましょう。\n<:
You'll have to cross paths with an adventurer in Astoltia... It will be <%nL_DAY> before you can use the box again, after you've
completed the encounter and gotten lucky...

165717.ふしぎな小箱が 示した冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがいましょう。\n<:
You'll pass adventurers in Astoltia who have been identified by the Mysterious Box. Once you've accomplished this, and you've earned
your fortune, you can immediately use the mysterious box again...

165718.対象となる冒険者を 変更しようとしましたが\nすでに すれちがいを達成しているた:
I tried to change the target adventurers, but they've already met each other, so I couldn't. I'm going to open the mysterious
box again and try to get lucky...

165719.もう一度 ふしぎな小箱を 使えるようになるのは\n<%nL_DAY>日後となりま:
It'll be <%nL_DAY> days before we can use the
curious little box again...<end>

165720.ふしぎな小箱は いつでも使える状態のようだ。\n<end>:
The mysterious little box is always ready for
use...<end>

165721.ふしぎな小箱に 示された冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがうことで\nフタ:
It seems that the lid can be opened by crossing paths in Astoltia with the adventurer indicated by the mysterious box...
It'll be <%nL_DAY> before you can use the box again after you've completed the encounter and opened the lid...

165722.ふしぎな小箱に 示された冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがうことで\nフタ:
It seems that the lid can be opened by crossing paths in Astoltia with the adventurer indicated by the mysterious box...
Once you've accomplished this and the lid is open, you can immediately use the mysterious box again...

165725.<pc>は ふしぎな小箱を使った！\nしかし ここでは使えなかった！\nふしぎな:
<pc> He used the curious little box! But it didn't
work here! But it didn't work here!<end>

165726.ふしぎな小箱は 何も反応しなかった。\nどうやら ふしぎな小箱は \nここでは使:
The mysterious little box is not
responding... Apparently, the mystery box
doesn't work here.<end>

165727.<color_yellow>\nふしぎな小箱に ついての説明です。\n<br>\:
This is a story about a mysterious little box... If you pass the adventurer shown in the box, the lid will open and you will get
the item inside. If you don't pass the adventurer indicated in the box, you can use the box the next day to change the adventurer
indicated... You can change the adventurer by using a small box the next day.

165731.<pc>は\n<%dL_NUM>ゴールドを\n手に入れた。<se_nots Sy:
<pc>  is now in possession of <%dL_NUM> gold...
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

165732.<pc>は\nちいさなメダルを <%dL_NUM>枚\n手に入れた。<se_no:
<pc>  I've got <%dL_NUM> of these little medals...
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

165733.ところが どうぐかばんが いっぱいで\n受け取れなかった。\n小箱の中身は 戻っ:
But I couldn't get it because my glove compartment was full. The contents of the small box were returned... I'll sort through
my bag to make room, and then I'll bring the box back...
